topic.title: 青岛老兵，堵截中央督导组
topic.body:
Yesterday there has been a film about this topic in big.kopykate.bit - today I cant find it anymore together with some more interesting political films from China?

Could you please upload again?

topic.title: Increase storrage limit
topic.body:
While trying to increase the limit on http://127.0.0.1:7660/14qzPjqXiZV5PokSbX1EnkKZtpUASNxnfZ i do get notice "This function is disabled on this proxy!" -what does this mean and how can i solve this please?
Its is independent whether i do it on the sidebar left or right..

1535798357_13hSQgvTK6DKhaibEh2nRAposTN4w.body:
> [kai0](#comment_665_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 来这里吧，很多很多http://127.0.0.1:43110/14qzPjqXiZV5PokSbX1EnkKZtpUASNxnfZ/

I cant read Chines -But whenever I click on the left side of http://127.0.0.1:7660/1F1AHWYc7Mt3GBV9ZgphyyG2Go7uodmBtL/ I do get  "Unable to connect" :-(

A English side would be a big help

Sorry it was http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/?Channel=kai0@zeroid.bit which brings "This site cant be reached" 
7660 was just out of a port-forwarding

this works - I saw that already...

But what is wrong with your channel on kopykate then?

I am sorry - even that comes not up "Not Found
video/laobingwq/laobingwq.html"

Which files exactly do you mean - i rather new to TeroNet?
My files on KopyKate are fine apart from just one 

 On 零网使用方法 i am asked to increase the limit - but when I like to do it says "This function is disabled on this proxy!" ?

Even on the sidebar it says "This function is disabled on this proxy!"

How to best contact @nofish - here with a new topic on talk or sending mail?

1535809392_13hSQgvTK6DKhaibEh2nRAposTN4w.body: Additional when doing it on the left side it says "You don't have permission to run siteSetLimit" even when locked in before..

> [d14na](#comment_14_1EAD2zXkzgJf6M7xQ4jG5FHCxUTez9NJJ4): Most proxies, including ours https://0net.io DO NOT allow this, as it could be easily abused by malicious actors. I regularly check the proxy to see if anything needs to be increased and almost always double the recommended increase.

The point is that I dont use a proxy when i get this message - i am direct within ZN

I assume it is somehow dependent on the username one had when heu first logged into that specific topic (for example mail)?

So how can i increase the storage limit with a different username?

> [thunder33345](#comment_221_1AHEQxyRG9s6owyJHShB4U4rg9GL5FMX5K): how do you start zeronet?start it with  --multiuser_local

That made the difference - thanks very much thunder33345 !

Could you please explain what it really does change (  Enable unsafe Ui functions and write users to disk) ?

> [d14na](#comment_55_1EAD2zXkzgJf6M7xQ4jG5FHCxUTez9NJJ4): @garlic i honestly don't know why you would get the message, "This function is disabled on this proxy!", if you're NOT using a proxy. Also, why is your port 7660 and not the standard 43110? that might be a clue as to the issue you're having.

I have a different port because I am forwarding from a remote machine....
